title: patch issue 004
body: please help me I have tried everything youtube and support has to offer me.. it was all working fine until I did a fresh install of windows 10 and then boom never been able to play lol since always patch failed 004

replies.body: Typically seeing a 004 error means that your OS is blocking League from launching the way it's supposed to. You should be able to get League up and running by setting up your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) again.
same man i dont know if itll be patched in tthe next one thats gonna get relased.
